data.title: Pleasure of His Company (Movie Tie-in Starring = Fred Astaire, Lilli Palmer, Debbie Reynolds; Bantam Books # A2162 ) by Glemser, Bernard: Very Good Soft cover (1961) PBO (Paperback Original) True Firs
data.meta_description: PBO (Paperback Original) True First Ed. - Soft cover - Bantam Books., USA - 1961 - Condition: Very Good - 150 pages. IMDB notes = "San Francisco debutante, Jessica Poole, is marrying Napa Valley cattle rancher, Roger Henderson, and hopes her peripatetic father, "Pogo" Poole, whom she hasn't seen for years, comes to the wedding. He arrives, disrupting the household of his ex-wife, Katharine, and her long-suff." >> Cover scuffing & creasing; pen to front end page; spine slant; Size: 12mo - over 6¾" - 7¾" Tall. - Pleasure of His Company (Movie Tie-in Starring = Fred Astaire, Lilli Palmer, Debbie Reynolds; Bantam Books # A2162 )
